languages.text: "Когда-то, {name}... вы обещали, что мы что-нибудь придумаем. Так ведь? Ведь, раз у ксеносов существуют такие штуки... надежда есть?"
"You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
languages.original_text: "Когда-то, {name}... вы обещали, что мы что-нибудь придумаем. Так ведь? Ведь, раз у ксеносов существуют такие штуки... надежда есть?"

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「前に約束してくれたわよね、{name}…何か方法を考えようって。そうでしょう？そして今、異種族がこういうものを持っていることを知った。つまりこれは…希望があるということ？」
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: 「前に約束してくれたわよね、{name}…何か方法を考えようって。そうでしょう？そして今、異種族がこういうものを持っていることを知った。つまりこれは…希望があるということ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你曾经答应过我，{name}……你说我们一定能想出办法，是吧？现在我们都知道，异形手里有这样的东西。也就是说……我们还有希望，对吗？”
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: “你曾经答应过我，{name}……说我们一定能想出办法，是吧？现在我们都知道，异形手里有这样的东西。也就是说……我们还有希望，对吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, una vez me prometió... que pensaríamos en algo, ¿verdad? Y ahora sabemos que los xenos tienen herramientas como esta. ¿Significa eso... que hay esperanza?».
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: «{name}, una vez me prometió... que pensaríamos en algo, ¿verdad? Y ahora sabemos que los xenos tienen herramientas como esta. ¿Significa eso... que hay esperanza?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir einmal versprochen, {name} ... Ihr habt mir versprochen, dass wir uns etwas einfallen lassen, richtig? Und jetzt wissen wir, dass die Xenos solche Dinger haben, das heißt also ... es besteht Hoffnung?"
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir einmal versprochen, {name} ... mir versprochen, dass wir uns etwas einfallen lassen, nicht wahr? Und jetzt wissen wir, dass die Xenos solche Dinger haben, das heißt also ... es besteht Hoffnung?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous m'aviez promis, {name}... Vous m'aviez promis qu'on trouverait une solution. Et maintenant qu'on sait que les xénos ont des appareils comme ça, alors... il y a de l'espoir, non ? »
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'aviez promis, {name}... Vous m'aviez promis qu'on trouverait une solution. Et maintenant qu'on sait que les xénos ont des appareils comme ça, alors... il y a de l'espoir, non ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bir keresinde bana söz vermiştin {name}... Çözüm bulacağımıza söz vermiştin, öyle ya? Zenoların elinde böyle şeyler olduğunu öğrendik, o hâlde... Umut var, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "You once promised me, {name}... you promised we'd think of something, right? And now we know the xenos have things like this, so that means... there's hope?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde bana söz vermiştin {name}... Bir çözüm bulacağız diye söz vermiştin, değil mi? Artık zenoların elinde böyle bir şeyler olduğunu öğrendiğimize göre, o hâlde... Umut var, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
